altername_name: Spy Kids: Todo el Tiempo del Mundo
name: Spy Kids: All the Time in the World
overview: The Timekeeper is threatening to take over the planet, and it’s up to you to stop him with hi-tech spy gear and specialized power-ups! Join the fight as new spies Rebecca and Cecil, using the unique skills of each to defeat baddies and bosses in the thrilling adventure of a lifetime! Features • Play through the major motion picture! • Ride the jet luge, hack computers, discover secret areas and more! • Master state-of-the-art gadgets and earn special attacks • Adventure through 8 dangerous levels, straight from the movie!
